bibl.title: The Impact of the Third Century Crisis on the International Trade with the East.
Crises and the Roman Empire. Proceedings of the Seventh Workshop of the International Network Impact of Empire (Nijmegen, June 20-24, 2006)
bibl.author: NAPPO, Dario

bibl.note: The reorganization of the Red Sea trade might have started by the end of the second century AD and might have been accelerated by the troubles of the third century and by the introduction of the lateen sail.
bibl.seg: NAPPO Dario, The Impact of the Third Century Crisis on the International Trade with the East.
